name: create_Appt
description: Use this tool to create a new appointment for a patient using the NexHealth API. You must pass in the appointment slot time, patient ID, provider ID, and operatory ID to create an appointment.
schema: [{"id":0,"property":"appointmentTime","description":"This is the time for the new appointment to be created (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sss-TZ:ZZ).","type":"string","required":true},{"id":1,"property":"patientId","description":"The patient ID for the appointment.","type":"string","required":true},{"id":2,"property":"providerId","description":"The provider ID for the appointment.","type":"string","required":true},{"id":3,"property":"operatoryId","description":"The operatory ID for the appointment.","type":"string","required":true},{"id":4,"property":"note","description":"Optional note for the appointment.","type":"string","required":false}]
